tasks.label: Run Django migrations and tests
tasks.command: python -m pip show django >NUL 2>&1 || python -m pip install django==4.2.20 django-allauth django-filter django-htmx django-seed pytest pytest-django ; python manage.py migrate ; pytest -q

tasks.label: Install deps, migrate, test (Powershell)
tasks.command: if (-not (python -m pip show django)) { python -m pip install django==4.2.20 django-allauth django-filter django-htmx django-seed pytest pytest-django } ; python manage.py migrate ; pytest -q
